item.title: #tidytuesday
item.description: My second submission for #TidyTuesday. I’m quite happy with the plot, not so sure about the title and the “message”, any feedback is welcome! code: https://github.com/gkaramanis/tidytuesday/tree/master/week%2011 â€¦ ![](/images/2019-03-12-20193tidytuesday-1/gametitles.png)
